resources.string: Account you want to make transfer from:
Please choose the amount to transfer
You can make payments by scanning the QR code and make the pay immediately.
Stay in touch with latest blockchain technology
Blockchain is an application to help you manage your wallet, make transfers to anyone you want and make payments in a direct way.
Transfers are essential in this technology
You can make transfers to anyone you want in a matter of seconds. Just specify details and you are done.
Payments made directly with one scan
You can make payments easily by just scanning the QR Code at all authorized merchants. Everything else is handled automatically.
